chunk:
Apto Skincare Turmeric Mist

Brand: Apto Skincare

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) ROOT, WATER, LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, PROPANEDIOL, CURCUMIN, DEXTRIN, FRUCTOSE, GLUCOSE, PHYTIC ACID, SUCROSE, ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER, ALOE BARBADENSIS EXTRACT, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, AVENA SATIVA (OAT)

, AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNEL EXTRACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) EXTRACT, YEAST EXTRACT, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, GENTIANA LUTEA ROOT EQUISETUM ARVENSE EXTRACT, MELISSA OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, SALVIA OFFICINALIS (SAGE) LEAF EXTRACT

(SAGE) LEAF EXTRACT, URTICA DIOICA (NETTLE) EXTRACT, SODIUM CHLORIDE, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, LINALOOL.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
